description:
This package contains the official SDK tools authored by the Microsoft Dynamics CRM SDK team.

The included command line tools are installed in the project's bin\coretools folder.
releaseNotes:
This package contains tools for the Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2016 SDK release. These tools may be used for application and solution development. The Microsoft .NET Framework 4.5.2 must be installed on the computer where these tools are to execute.

8.0.2.1: UR1 (Update Rollup 1) with customer related hotfix
8.0.2: UR1 (Update Rollup 1)
8.0.1: GA (General Availability)
8.0.0: RTM release

* The CrmSvcUtil.exe program has been updated with additional command line parameters. For more information, run the program with no parameters to see the online help.
summary: Tools required to develop managed code applications and solutions for Microsoft Dynamics CRM Online 2016 and Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2016.
title: Microsoft Dynamics CRM 2016 SDK core tools
